dsense.name: perceive [sth/sb]⇒
dsense.guideword: (with object: detect with the senses) (通过感官)

example.eg: Jess perceived a tinge of regret in Simon's voice.
example.egtrans: 杰西从西蒙的声音中察觉出一丝悔恨之意。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 察觉到，察觉出, 感知到

example.eg: Jane perceived Martin's unwillingness to change his mind.
example.egtrans: 简发觉马丁不愿意改变主意。

example.eg: Ian perceived that his efforts were of no use.
example.egtrans: 伊安意识到，他的努力都白费了。
